product_name: Manduka Black Mat PRO Yoga Mat - 85"
long_description: The 85 in. Manduka Black Mat PRO Yoga Mat is known for its simple design, nonslip surface, thick cushioning and excellent durability. 0.25 in. thickness cushions your spine, hips, knees and elbows on hard surfaces. Slip-resistant, fabriclike top surface does not get sticky, even when wet with perspiration. Dot pattern on the bottom keeps the mat from sliding on many different surfaces.
short_description: The 85 in. Manduka Black Mat PRO Yoga Mat is known for its simple design, nonslip surface, thick cushioning and excellent durability.
